main event: Four airmen observed a silver, disc-shaped object east of Moriarity, New Mexico on 13 April 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as silver-colored and elliptical,It turned and dove during observation,The sighting lasted 5-10 minutes,There was a piball balloon released in the area, but the objectâ€™s speed and maneuverability were inconsistent with balloon behavior.
